Text: Your FREE trial of Transmission WeekMonthLong Trial of Transmission Week No Cost The most important and most unpredictable piece of todays electric power market Easy Transmission Its confusing complex and troublesome to follow Add in the secondary markets and things become even more complicated But now theres TRANSMISSION WEEK and you can try it for weeks risk FREE TRANSMISSION WEEK is an electronic newsletter from the publishers of Megawatt Daily Generation Week Gas Daily and other top energy publications It will keep you informed on every regional transmission organization whats working and whats not Get the lowdown on settlement systems bidding rules price caps generation interconnections seams issues and other controversies TRANSMISSION WEEK makes sense out of new and evolving markets for transmission rights and congestion contracts It keeps you up to speed on New transmission line projects and how theyll change the markets Merchant transmission lines and private transmission companies Security coordination and reliability initiatives Transmission outages Secondary markets Enabling agreements and terms Pricing schemes Forecasting and seasonal transmission availability FERC policies plus transmission disputes there and at the state commissions OASIS developments New varieties of firm and nonfirm services and how they compare Technology developments to ease transmission bottlenecks risk FREE Issues and Savings Too One free issue is already attached If you like what you see just click on this link and sign up to receive more risk free issues of TRANSMISSION WEEK transweek or call Please reference code when ordering and receive a discount If you dont want to receive ANY Financial Times Energy email please email Irene Kristufek at with the words NO EMAIL in the subject line of your message I look forward to hearing from you Randy Rischard Publisher twpdf
